Detailed Description

cvmx_bts_pll_ctl

This register controls the sample clock frequency into PD Bank slices. The following sequence is the PLL-bringup sequence: 1. Write [RESET_N]=0 and [DIV_RESET]=1. 2. Set [CLKF] and [PS_EN]. 3. Wait 128 reference-clock cycles. 4. Write [RESET_N]=1. 5. Wait 1152 reference-clock cycles. 6. Write [DIV_RESET]=0. 7. Wait 10 reference-clock cycles before using the PLL clock out.
